metadata.title: CVE-2024-0093 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU software for Linux contains a vulnerability where it can exposesensitive information to an actor that is not explicitly authorized to haveaccess to that information. A successful exploit of this vulnerabilitymight lead to information disclosure.

criterions.comment: linux package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'replaced by linux-hwe-5.4').
linux-hwe-5.4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
